description:
An intuitive diagram software with templates for any scenario.

EdrawMax is a powerful, all-in-one, and yet easy-to-use diagramming tool that enables users to visualize the ideas effortlessly. With EdrawMax, you can create and customize flowcharts, Venn diagrams, mind maps, organizational charts, Gantt charts, UML diagrams, electrical drawings, genograms, building plans, etc.
1. Now you can easily adjust spacing and size for flowcharts in bulk. Set specific spacing values to fit your needs or quickly reset to the default settings for a streamlined look. 2. You can now adjust text transparency to achieve stunning visual effects. 3. Now you can enjoy a smoother experience with an improved UI for fill and background dropdowns. 4. We have fixed some bugs.
